channel.title: StandardUSB numberpad/keyboard like USB mouse
channel.description:
I'm starting my axoloti journey, today I begin connecting buttons and potentiometers.
I came across the USB mouse object and it occurred to me - is there a straightforward way to plug a USB numberpad or standard computer keyboard into the USB input?

item.title: StandardUSB numberpad/keyboard like USB mouse
item.dc:creator: @samgrober samgrober
item.description:
@samgrober wrote:

Ah, interesting, thanks kindly.

Read full topic

item.title: StandardUSB numberpad/keyboard like USB mouse
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

There is some code to support USB keyboards in the firmware, but the object hasn't been fully implemented yet. Note that keyboards with a built-in USB hub like the standard Apple keyboards won't work.
